TopicTitle: Maneuver Creator App (Version 1.12) Not Working Properly?

Articles.Content:
I'm in orbit of Kerbin, I want to go to Mun.  I've done that a million times, but today I thought I'd try to the new maneuver tool.

When I go to create a transfer using the tool, it sets a maneuver for six days from now...  I know there is a good opportunity to transfer to Mun in every orbit.  So why the delay?

What am I doing wrong?  I can't find anything to modify in the app.  The only option seems to be "Create."

I did have Steam verify all my files, I am running the current version.

Edited July 8, 2021 by Mush_Morton
add more info

Nah, it's working fine. It is, in fact, working perfectly fine. Too perfectly, one might say.

I've previously written about this here:

Ah. I had basically the same question. Thought I'd search here before asking. Like Mush_Morton, I've gone to Mun a zillion times - enough so that it's just pointless tedium to manually create the nodes. Tried the new maneuver creator app just for kicks. Guess I'll continue using McJeb for this (or Astrogator, which sometimes seems to do better for interplanetary transfers).
